description: Contains various information relating to a single contact of an adjudication record. Adjudication records are used by Ambulatory Pharmacy during prescription copay adjudication.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: BIN_NUM
columns.description: The BIN (Bank Identification Number) used during prescription adjudication. This number can be stored in the plan and payor, and a different number can be returned based on whether the adjudication is primary or not. (101-A1)

columns.name: PROCESSOR_CTRL_NUM
columns.description: The processor control number used during prescription adjudication. This number can be stored in the plan and payor, and a different number can be returned based on whether the adjudication is primary or not.(104-A4)

columns.name: ORG_PRESC_PROD_CODE
columns.description: NCPDP code of the initially prescribed product or service.(445-EA)

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: I_TX_CODE_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code identifying the type of transaction.

columns.name: I_TX_CODE_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_HEADER_RESP_ST_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating the status of the transmission.

columns.name: I_HEADER_RESP_ST_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_SVC_PROV_QUAL_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code qualifying the 'Service Provider ID' (201-B1).

columns.name: I_SVC_PROV_QUAL_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_PYR_QUAL_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating the type of payer ID.

columns.name: I_PYR_QUAL_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_MCAID_MEM_ID_NUM
columns.description: A unique member identification number assigned by the Medicaid Agency.

columns.name: I_MEDICAID_AGNC_NUM
columns.description: The Medicaid Agency Number sent to the payer (116-N6)

columns.name: I_CARDHOLDER_ID
columns.description: Insurance ID assigned to the cardholder or identification number used by the plan.

columns.name: I_MCARE_D_CVG_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating whether a coverage is a Medicare Part D Coverage

columns.name: I_MCARE_D_CVG_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_CMS_LICS_LEVEL
columns.description: ID for the formulary list

columns.name: I_CONTRACT_NUMBER
columns.description: Code indicating the status of the transmission.

columns.name: I_FORMULARY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the formular list.

columns.name: I_BENEFIT_ID
columns.description: Insurance ID assigned to the cardholder or identification number used by the plan.

columns.name: I_NXT_MDCR_D_EFF_DT
columns.description: A Medicare Part D coverage's effective starting date

columns.name: I_NXT_MDCR_D_TR_DT
columns.description: A Medicare Part D coverage's effective ending date

columns.name: I_PATIENT_FIRST_NAM
columns.description: Patient's first name sent to the payer (310-CA)

columns.name: I_PATIENT_LAST_NAME
columns.description: Patient's last name sent to the payer (311-CB)

columns.name: I_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: ID for the formulary list

columns.name: I_TX_RESP_STAT_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating the status of the transaction.

columns.name: I_TX_RESP_STAT_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_HELP_DESK_QUAL_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code qualifying the phone number in the 'Help Desk Phone Number' (550-8F).

columns.name: I_HELP_DESK_QUAL_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_TX_REF_NUM
columns.description: Code indicating the status of the transaction.

columns.name: I_INT_CTRL_NUM
columns.description: Number assigned by the processor to identify an adjudicated claim when supplied in payer-to-payer coordination of benefits only.

columns.name: I_URL
columns.description: The web page address sent to the payer (987-MA)

columns.name: I_RX_RF_NUM_QUAL_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating the type of billing submitted.

columns.name: I_RX_RF_NUM_QUAL_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_MCAID_CLAIM_NUM
columns.description: Claim number assigned by the Medicaid Agency.

columns.name: I_TAX_EXEMPT_IND_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating the payer and/or the patient is exempt from taxes.

columns.name: I_TAX_EXEMPT_IND_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_BAS_REIM_DET_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code identifying how the reimbursement amount was calculated for 'Ingredient Cost Paid' (506-F6).

columns.name: I_BAS_REIM_DET_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_BAS_DISP_FEE_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating how the reimbursement amount was calculated for 'Dispensing Fee Paid' (507-F7).

columns.name: I_BAS_DISP_FEE_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_BAS_CALC_COPAY_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating how the Copay reimbursement amount was calculated for 'Patient Pay Amount' (505-F5).

columns.name: I_BAS_CALC_COPAY_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_BAS_FLAT_TAX_ID
columns.description: NCPD code indicating how the reimbursement amount was calculated for 'Flat Sales Tax Amount Paid' (558-AW).

columns.name: I_BAS_FLAT_TAX_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_BAS_PCT_TAX_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating how the reimbursement amount was calculated for 'Percentage Sales Tax Amount Paid' (559-AX).

columns.name: I_BAS_PCT_TAX_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_AMT_ATTR_PROC_FEE
columns.description: This specifies the amount that is attributed to the processor fee.

columns.name: I_PAT_SAL_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The sales tax that has been calculated.

columns.name: I_PLAN_SAL_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The sales tax amount attributed to the plan.

columns.name: I_AMT_COINS
columns.description: The amount of coinsurance that was calculated.

columns.name: I_BAS_CALC_COINS
columns.description: NCPDP code specifying the basis on which the coinsure was calculated.

columns.name: I_BAS_CALC_COINS_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_EST_GENERC_SAVING
columns.description: The calculated estimated generic savings.

columns.name: I_SP_ACC_AMT_REM
columns.description: The amount remaining on the spending amount. (128-UC)

columns.name: I_HPFA_AMT
columns.description: Medicare Part D Coverage Code

columns.name: I_AMT_PROV_NET_SEL
columns.description: The amount that has been attributed to the provider network selection

columns.name: I_AMT_PROD_SEL_BRAN
columns.description: The amount that is attributed to product selection for branded drugs.

columns.name: I_AMT_NPRF_FRM_SEL
columns.description: The amount that is attributed to a product selection for non preferred formulary selections.

columns.name: I_AMT_BRND_NPRF_FRM
columns.description: The amount that is attributed to product selection for Brand non preferred formulary selections.

columns.name: I_AMT_ATTR_CVG_GAP
columns.description: The amount that is attributed to the coverage gap.

columns.name: I_INGR_COST_CNTRCTD
columns.description: The cost of the ingredient contracted/reimbursable amount.

columns.name: I_DISP_FEE_CNTRCTD
columns.description: The dispensible free that was contracted/reimbursable amount

columns.name: I_PCT_TAX_PD_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating the percentage sales tax paid basis.

columns.name: I_PCT_TAX_PD_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: Code qualifying the phone number in the 'Help Desk Phone Number' (550-8F).

columns.name: REVERSE_OF_RXA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the original adjudication that this reversal or rebill is reversing.

columns.name: REVERSE_OF_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique contact date in decimal format of the original adjudication that this reversal or rebill is reversing.

columns.name: IS_MANUALLY_APPROVED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the adjudication attempt was manually approved.  'N' or NULL indicate that the attempt was not manually approved.  'Y' indicates that the attempt as manually approved.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PREVIOUS_ADJ_RXA_ID
columns.description: Gets the adjudication attempt ID of the previous coverage in the filing order at the moment of this adjudication attempt. For primary coverage adjudications, this will always be null. For secondary coverages, this will point to the primary coverage. For tertiary coverages, this will point to the secondary coverage.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_ADJ_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Gets the unique adjudication attempt date of the previous coverage in the filing order at the moment of this adjudication attempt. For primary coverage adjudications, this will always be null. For secondary coverages, this will point to the primary coverage. For tertiary coverages, this will point to the secondary coverage.
